org.puredata.core.utils

Class IoUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.puredata.core.utils.IoUtils

  • public class IoUtils
extends Object
    IoUtils is a collection of convenience methods for dealing with file I/O.
    Author:
    Peter Brinkmann (peter.brinkmann@gmail.com)

      • extractZipResource

        public static List<File> extractZipResource(InputStream in,
                            File directory)
                                     throws IOException
        Extract a zip resource into real files and directories, not overwriting existing files
        Parameters:
        in - typically given as getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.something)
        directory - target directory
        Returns:
        list of files that were unpacked, not including files that existed before
        Throws:
        IOException

      • extractZipResource

        public static List<File> extractZipResource(InputStream in,
                            File directory,
                            boolean overwrite)
                                     throws IOException
        Extract a zip resource into real files and directories
        Parameters:
        in - typically given as getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.something)
        directory - target directory
        overwrite - indicates whether to overwrite existing files
        Returns:
        list of files that were unpacked (if overwrite is false, this list won't include files that existed before)
        Throws:
        IOException
